definition: to repay debts of gratitude/to repay kindness
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
to repay kindness with kindness, and repay enmity with justice (idiom, from Analects)
pinyin: yi3 zhi2 bao4 yuan4 , yi3 de2 bao4 de2

sentences.english: Those who return evil for good may expect their neighbor's pity to be worn out at last.
sentences.chinese: 以怨報德的人，最後將失去鄰居的憐憫。

sentences.english: He that rendereth evil for good, evil shall not depart from his house.
sentences.chinese: 誰以怨報德，災禍必不離開他的家。

sentences.english: But he still ingratitude night, Bishop stole the precious silver tableware.
sentences.chinese: 但他還是以怨報德，夜晚偷走了主教珍貴的銀餐具。
